prerequisites: TWO OF: Archaeology 25, Science (Biology) 25, Science (Bontany) 25, Science (Geology) 25, Science (Zoology) 25
system.description: You gain +20 on rolls to identify Fossils (Pokemon or otherwise) and operate Reanimation Machines or similar mechanisms (including as part of the "Revival" Downtime Action).

actions.name: Palaeontologist
actions.description: You gain +20 on rolls to identify Fossils (Pokemon or otherwise) and operate Reanimation Machines or similar mechanisms (including as part of the "Revival" Downtime Action).
